text: Kadri Mälk (née Sõer; 27 January 1958 – 1 January 2023) was an Estonian artist and jewellery designer. Mälk was born in Tallinn. She graduated from the Estonian Academy of Arts in 1986. Mälk was assigned to the Estonian Academy of Arts from 1989. She was also a professor in the jewellery department at the school from 1996. Mälk was married three times. Her final husband was writer and translator Mati Sirkel. Mälk died after an illness on 1 January 2023, at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Designers Category:People from Tallinn Category:Deaths from disease
title: Kadri Mälk
